column4: Hi! I am trying to setup a basic DHCP server on 10.10. I have installed the program and modified the dhcpd.conf file to subnet 192.168.1.10 netmask 255.255.255.0 which gives me a bad subnet number/mask combination? any ideas?
does you file look similar to the examples in the man page?
It all looks OK -- subnet 192.168.1.10 netmask 255.255.255.0 { range 192.168.1.80 192.168.1.99;} This is the only line apart from the default lease info.
